Description.Name: Million C-Bill Tribute
Description.Details: This is a tribute, paid from the various pirates under your command to you, the Pirate Lord. Taken from the hides of the corrupt and greedy Successor States, this cool million C-Bills should go a good way towards keeping the wheels of piracy turning. Down with the Inner Sphere! C-Bills for our coffers! Long Live the Pirate Lord! Do not attempt to sell this, bad things happen.
